course.title: Supervised Reading and Research
course.faculty_text: Abraham Loeb and members of the Department
course.description: Supervised reading and research in a subject of astrophysics that is not normally included in the regular course offerings of the department.
course.notes: Students must arrange for course supervision with an individual member of the Department. The course may be counted only once toward the concentration requirements, and may not be taken more than twice. This course is offered each semester.
